purpose: Facilitates the management and orchestration of AI models and agents across various platforms, enhancing enterprise AI capabilities.
principle: Built on a model-context-protocol (MCP) and agent-to-agent (A2A) management framework, supporting integration with leading AI models like ChatGPT, Claude, and Llama.
reusability: Offers an admin UI and APIs for integrating various AI models and agents, supports Single-Sign-On and user management for enterprise use.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited documentation for end-users.
name: casibase
description: ⚡️AI Cloud OS: Open-source enterprise-level AI knowledge base and MCP (model-context-protocol)/A2A (agent-to-agent) management platform with admin UI, user management and Single-Sign-On⚡️, supports ChatGPT, Claude, Llama, Ollama, HuggingFace, etc., chat bot demo: https://ai.casibase.com, admin UI demo: https://ai-admin.casibase.com
highlight: Enterprise-level AI knowledge base and multi-agent management platform with robust admin UI and user management.
